snippet: As his poll numbers have fallen, Mr. Trump has taken reporters to his top properties in between campaign events — perhaps looking beyond Election Day....
abstract: Donald Trump, amid declining poll numbers, has begun promoting his marquee properties off campaign trail, taking reporters to sites in between events; actions have raised questions about whether Trump is already looking beyond election, charge that he disputes.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and NICK CORASANITI

lead_paragraph: As his poll numbers have fallen, Mr. Trump has taken reporters to his top properties in between campaign events — perhaps looking beyond Election Day.

headline.main: Donald Trump the Candidate Promotes Trump the Brand on Campaign Trail
headline.print_headline: Trump the Candidate Takes to Promoting Trump the Brand on the Campaign Trail
